import React from 'react' import moment from 'moment' import { toast, ToastContainer } from 'react-toastify' import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; const TransactionTable = ({ details, name, Date, text }) => { const edit = () =>{ alert('edit') } const deleteP = () =>{ alert('edit') } return (
{details.map((result) => { return ( <> ) })}
{name} From {name} Amount {Date} Options
{result.text} {result.amount} {moment(result.createdAt).format('lll')}
) } export default TransactionTable
